title: Riot - Update open ladder please
body: Its now Friday and still hasn't been updated with the ACL and Xfire results. 2 people have posted on the actual open ladder thing without reply, can we get a eta on this?

replies.body: Still nothing. you wonder why the competitive scene is a joke here? act like you give a %%%%. And for the love of god.. next split please dont use %%%%ing cyber gamer.. bracket tournaments work, that %%%% doesnt.
still no reply or update. inb4 "the forgotten series". they dont even respond to your support tickets anymore too..
